title: Suitcase Type
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Suitcase Type**

An independent [Czech](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Czech%20Republic) foundry of [Tomáš Brousil](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tomas%20Brousil). Font families include Atrament, Botanika, Fishmonger, Katarine, Magion, Orgovan and RePublic.

Website: [http://www.suitcasetype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005125/http:/www.suitcasetype.com/ "http://www.suitcasetype.com")
author: filip blazek
